itemDescription: storytelling activist from the United Kingdom

wikipedia_page.main: Rosie King (born c. 1998) is a British writer, public speaker and autism advocate. She has featured in a BBC documentary on the subject, and she is a prominent contributor to the Pablo TV series.

response: |A special about what it is like to have autism with 13-year-old Rosie King.
|14-year-old Rosie King, who has autism, hears the moving, often inspirational stories of kids who, like her, have made the great leap to big school.
* Llama (voiced by Rosie King): Llama loves to skip around back and forth on her four legs. She has echolalia.
